values: it is easy to push away the ones we love so much. sometimes it takes a few words, or maybe none at all to push someone away. i keep thinking about the past few days and they have been a true mess. i just dont understand them. but after today, a very looonnng day, i feel like some things just aren't meant for us to understand. it takes a big person to admit fault and an even bigger one to move on. we will never be perfect. nothing in this world is. the weather is even one or two degrees off. so if the weather is off, why do we think people won't be. we all have our day, or even at time...days. no matter how long it takes for something to get back to normal remember to love those who u push away because u never know when they'll just be gone for good. a lot of times we feel so passionate about one thing or another and feel that the feeling needs to be shared. sometimes you regret saying things that are the truth because u dont expect the impact that words carry. but since an early age you are told to always be honest and speak freely. and while it is important to tell the truth it is also important to be considerate of your words, actions, thoughts, etc. we live, laugh and love. its all a part of life.
http://mzk-ifuplz.livejournal.com/10193.html

guess it just doesn't matter. i mean i dont understand how i can feel bad about nothing at all. after all i didnt say that you sucked today so i shouldn't be upset. but i guess i just feel like maybe it was my fault. idk. i guess. yesterday was our 6 month anniversary and the day after we can't even hold a conversation. maybe im not sensitive maybe that was just a mean thing to say. i mean, yeah u might have been playing around but then say that. dont let me believe all day that im wrong n i shouldnt have thought that way. just put your pride aside and apologize. earlier today i told u that i wasn't "trippin" over it and i wasn't. i mean after hearing u say "damn nigga" and then "babe, you suck" i just floated off in my own world. i guess i just will grow accustomed to that. but then where does ur part come in? its funny how u can talk 2 everyone else today but me. a relationship gets hard sometimes and when it gets hard it gets really hard. and the funny thing is no matter how badly i feel i still am in love with this person who won't share a conversation with me. i mean i guess when u tell someone u need time to yourself or i'll call back later u think about what happened, think about the solution, call the person back, talk about it, apologize etc. i cant really just let things go especially when i feel bad. i jus want to own up to my responsibilites in whatever happened n when its done its done. but when u decide that we dont have to talk about n e thing and that everything will be fine when u talk to me again ummmm thats not how it works. at least say something...like yeah i was wrong, or i wasn't wrong. dont just drag it out. because here it is day 2...still no happy anniversary, and im still wondering if i was wrong for not appreciating the fact that i suck. but im living for the moment. and at this moment i am still in love with you. and will continue to be. we are different and we are going to have disagreements, they just suck (no pun intended).

i wish i had a better way to deal with stress n shit...  i dont though. i feel like i can't deal with stuff a lot. its like i dont know my capabilities. i second guess everything about me. second guess my decisions. i lack confidence in the things that i decide to do or my judgements. im not as strong as i thought i was. takes someone to break u to realize your capabilities. so i feel broken. just want to be fixed. i can see how someone can paint a beautiful picture on the outside but be in pain and hurt on the inside. either way i have to put on a smile and seem happy, jovial, etc. when on the inside i feel like shit. dont know why i even had to put myself in the situations that i do. im so damn sensitive i hate it. y cant i just take everything with a smile and keep going. i gotta analyze. am i happy w/me? idk n e more. im starting to feel like the old me again...holding stuff in just because i dont want to get judged. because i know my problems aren't big to anyone else. and i dont wanna sound stupid or sensitive. im so tired of being called that shit. im not sensitive im me. i cant help it. im not tough... i want to be. i cry...everyday over something. one thing/person, both, anything. dont look at me wrong because i'll feel bad. don't question me because i'll feel stupid. don't challenge me because i'll feel threatened. don't correct me because it means i don't know what im talking about. don't brush off my concerns because it means you aren't interested. dont yell at me because thats mean. dont disrespect me because im not disrespectful. don't talk down on me because im not stupid. dont be sarcastic because i hate that shit. dont say u understand when u dont. don't bullshit me because im the bullshitter. i dont listen well, dont pay attention, dont like certain foods,hate following directions, and im hard headed. sorry. thats just who i am. im loving, caring, compassionate, sensitive, picky, generous, self conscious, nice, likable and i ask a lot of questions. i question everything so that i can say that i can know everything. there's a thin line between what i like and what i dont like. a lot of people make me smile but only a few make me happy. someone else wants to be me but there's only one me. i loved high school. i was hated. loved. but respected. i dont have my shit together. i dont want to be alone. i think about my wedding. i think about my family. i think about my relationship. i think about my dad. i hope i make him proud. i think about how my nephew won't know his grandfather. i think about why. i think about clothes. i was smarter than the last 3. i ended the last 3. i want to cut my hair. im too scared to do it. i wish it were longer. i wish i wasnt so hairy. i wish my skin was better. i need to work out. i need a work out. i need to shut up. and stop writing to myself. i had an f'd up day. i need to talk to you.

soooo its been a minute....but who cares? n e ways... im still alive. stress is a monkey lol.. i felt kind of bad b/c my #1 fan told me to get rid of my livejournal b/c i never write in it anyway. my reply? NOOOOOOOOO WAYYYYYY... its weird b/c its a way that i kind of write to myself/that special someone..ahem jerome ahem. now what shall i write about? i could backdate this entry to like 3 wks ago when j came 2 visit me. yaaaayyy! that was like the best time of my life. honestly i just felt so happy and at ease with everything. didn't really care about much, except us. that visit took my mind off of a lot of stuff that i probably would have just locked myself up n my room and thought about all day. school is really tough without having ur best friend around. i mean when u think about it you do most of the things in your everyday life, from pre-school through high school with one particular person. this is one of the things that i am doing alone....all alone for the next 2.6 years. it sucks a lot and i really don't want 2 get used to spending everyday locked away in my room. i think im getting depressed. i never really have been depressed before so i wouldn't know. but sometimes i don't feel like waking up in the morning. i dont even know how i make it through the day. if it weren't for j i really don't know how i would be able to do a lot on my own. idk if he really realizes it but i depend on him a whole lot now. he's the only one who can really cheer me up and just listen to me cry and complain. sometimes i physically feel sick because of all of this stuff going on right now. im never one to be constantly sad, scared or just not me. i wish i wasn't so sensitive or just a stronger willed person. i let a lot of stuff get to me. i take everything personally, and i don't know how to change it. its who i am. i wish i could take being put down but i can't. and i don't even know what to do to get the point when i can understand. i'll write more later....gotta go

sooooo....i know i haven't wrote n a while...so much stuff has happened n change...school's a b!tch but ne ways thats not y im writing. im writing bcuz 2day is my 2 month anniversary!!! exactly 61 days of officially being with someone who i have the deepest feelings of appreciation and love for. to some, 2 months might not mean much but to me it means a lot. bcuz we are building our future and our relationship everyday. we're really recognizing what love about each other and are striving to fufill each others expectations for our relationship. this 2 months is 2 months closer to 2 years and i am anxiously awaiting even our 1 year anniversary. everything that im not, he is...and everything he's not, i am. he's my everything. my world. my breath and my life. i'd actually rather write that we had been together for 61 days just because it seems soooooo long lol but it doesnt matter. what matters is that we love each other and that we keep adding on to 61 days. now when i look at this picture i laugh. just because i could never imagine us being together in a serious relationship. as bad as i wanted to become serious with jerome i would have never thought that he felt the same way about me. i guess we both look really nervous or anxious in this pic. we probably were thinking the same thing...scared, not knowing what that pic would mean months down the line. i wish i could have predicted the future from this pic. this was actually like one of our first pics we ever took together. its like a reminder of everything we went through together.....yeah and i definitely had a boyfriend in that pic lol...whatever he was a loser and jerome is cuter lol..but yeah just remembering all those times when we felt anxious, nervous, scared and goofy around each other just because we knew that we liked each other and didnt know how to pursue each other. i wish we could go back and relive those times. so on july 8 2006 i said yes to a nervous and fast breathing jerome asking me to be his girlfriend and make it official. while i was watching i might need security not thinkin anything about what jerome asked me i was remembering all those times we spent together and how far we came from that very first pic we had taken together. its definitely destiny that we are together and its really funny how important pictures are to our relationship. i mean i did meet him while he was taking his senior pictures and i did work at a portrait studio...just a big huge conicidence. soooo basically i love my boyfriend. he's my best friend. my everything. he talks to me when im sad. he lets me cry whenever i feel like it. he doesnt laugh at me...that much. he talks to me about anything and he's basically just like me. and now that we're far away it helps to have him there everyday. i cant wait until we see each other again. i love you baby, happy two months....muah!

just thinking about how i left love....it was the worst time for me. to say goodbye is hard and even harder when u fall in love. now that i have left my j i feel like im falling even more in love with him. i didnt imagine that i could be so in love. we have an excellent relationship and excellent lines of communication. not to jinx our relationship or anything like that but everyone can tell that we're in love just thru pictures, our phone conversations and the way that i talk about him. i feel so blessed to be able to have a great relationship despite the distance. we are making this work for our future and because we have genuine love and respect for one another. i really dont know what i would be doing right now without him. he's my everything, my everything. every thing. he said that im the tears when he cries, the thoughts when he thinks and the beat to his heart.... and i fell even more in love with him. i feel like im myself when im talking to him and when im not talking to him im thinking about talking to him. i just love him. pure love. nothing fake or nothing forced just love. he could ask me right now at 1:39 am to marry him and i would say yes or he could ask me five years from now and i would say yes. i KNOW that he's the one that i want to spend the rest of my life with. there's not a better friend i could ask for. i guess i found my soul mate. its destiny...guess clark was a great choice, because if i didnt choose clark i would have found him AGAIN..and if he didnt choose clark he wouldn't have seen kendra from emagine studios again. destiny didnt fail me....God definitley knows whats best for you. and despite all of the things we had to straighten out before our relationship was official, i wouldnt trade those loooonnng nights and days for anything because it made us better...individually and as a couple. j is my heart, my everything. destiny brought me back to him...

when the loneliness starts to set in then what do you do? i dont know. all that i can is cry and think about all of the good times and memories that we share. but i cant cry forever. i cant even sleep.everytime i think about the memories my heart aches and i feel less and less complete. i feel like i am missing a very important part of me. i feel like i have no life or energy to move on throughout my day. i just want to lay around and miss you all day. i guess absence does make the heart grow fonder but i didnt even imagine it would be like this. i have no one who i care about, here, to make new memories with. its hard to start over fresh when u have basically spent part of your life surrounded by the same people and now you are forced to do everything on your own. Loneliness feels like a force that has embodied everything that is me. it is so hard to show a smile on my face when i know that inside i feel sad and depressed. loneliness is like a bottomless pit, it feels like you are all alone.... loneliness. it gives you time to think about who you are and what the people in your life mean to you. i never analyzed myself so much...thought about my best friend so much....wished that i could change everything... the miles between us cause hurt. i feel like im missing part of me. with that being said now what do i do? i can't cry everyday because i did that before and its not a good thing to do. i cant always feel like i had to do something differently or that i can change everything. when there are moments like this when i have no one to talk to all i can do is cry and think. think about the past. think about what is going on now...and think about what is to come. love endures all things. i know that this is true love. my heart aches to be whole again and to experience the joys of love and friendship. this is going to be one of the hardest things i have ever had to deal with in my life. i wish i didn't have 2 deal with it alone. i love you so much that i can't even think about doing anything without you. please god just help me to be strong for us. i know i can't be sad forever. i can't cry the distance away. i wish i could do something but this is god's plan for us. i just love you. i cant even describe how much or how or why i just know that i do. just like i know that i have to blink or eat or even pee. i just know that i love you and that i miss you and that i cant wait until we are together again. just me n my j

guess its time to write in my livejournal huh? aight so my day was okay today i guess...nothing really exciting happened. y do i seem suprised...nothing much really suprises me these days. its funny how much u think about someone. no matter how far away you are it always seems like we are faaaaaar away. i feel so selfish at times b/c i just feel like i miss u that much. man school is about 2 blow me liiike..i can tell. i got it bad...like usher said. man its gonna be so hard to leave on friday. everytime i think about it my heart drops. its like a part of me has to leave one of the most important things in my life. i just dont want 2 be alone. i wasnt prepared to not have my #1 source of support, miles away from me. i would give anything to have him there with me. it feels like we invested too much into this relationship for it to end...ending it isnt an option for me. i have a lot of faith in us and i know we'll be okay. i just really dont want 2 feel lonely. im scared of so much....like us not being able to be there for each other....like off the 2am i want 2 talk about something that is bothering me..idk if u are always gonna be there for me, school and other projects take up a lot of time. tryin not 2 sound selfish but its the truth. i want so much love and attention. im a girl though. and im really sensitive on top of that. sometimes i dont think im prepared for whats really about to happen. especially with all thats about to unravel in this next year or so. aight so im about 2 make a list of everything that bothers me...not really bothers me but that i often think about, here it goes; 1.distance/loneliness 2.amount of time spent together 3.b.stew 4.college sh!t/transferring or whatever 5.distance lets just basically call this, project atlanta....bcuz i think if i wasnt actually going to be in atlanta, 4 out of 5 of the things listed would actually be gone off of my list. well the first joint is basically because its going to be difficult to go from seeing someone at least 2 days a week and talking all day to seeing about 2 times every few months or so and squeezing in phone time after a whole day of classes and homework on top of that. its a challenge to juggle a full load of classes and a relationship. a long distance relationship on top of that. okay well the amount of time spent together is kind of like #1.... so i cant really elaborate on that any further. except for the fact i gotta stack chips so that i can take some flights... aight so #3 is kind of out of my control. i guess the only thing that bothers me about that is that its gonna take a lot of time up so i just hope that we can do is make sure we remember 2 talk to each other even when we are too busy. im just really anxious to see how all of this is going to work itself out. all i want is a little bit of attention some time...and thats about it. #4 is in my control however, if i can't get enough money from whatever school i decide to transfer to, i will be at clark atlanta. i decided today that i would stop stressing myself out over schools. i have to make my educational experience my own and complaining about it isnt going to fix problems that have been affecting clark since forever. its just something i have to come to terms with. and #5 distance..its just like #1..it just is what it is. 2 b continued..................................... im tired of typing

so.....i think so much i can't talk. guess im just a thinker, can't make an excuse for that sh!t. fre$h..im tryin to think about something to write about....hmmmm who made a song about hater blockers? this is getting out of control. aight i know what i'll write about...my hunny bunny. dang i really wanna know who made this lame ass song n e ways. i hate working...one day i hope to make enough money so that i dont have to wake up early in the am to bullsh!t. i mean i like working if its something i like to do. i hate tedious stuff. i like doing fun stuff, hands on, something that keeps me busy and intrigued. i like that word, intrigue. when ur intrigued u have that face like hehe...i like that pic.. someone special to me took it... speaking of someone special. i had a difficult day today. i walked in my dad's house during lunch and just started crying. i know one day it will get a lot easier for me to just go through the day without feeling upset over something that i had no control over. its really hard to hold onto memories of someone that you lost because you so badly want to relive the memory. everytime i think about how much my dad is physically going to miss out on my heart feels like its missing something. man i just wish that i had the chance to relive everything. so many important things that i have to experience without that one important person. i could never replace the void that i have no matter how hard i try. i see his face everyday and remember the last moments we had. it hurts so bad. i take it day by day. sometimes it feels like the next day will be better but it seems like its not. it just feels like im numb to the pain. i talk to him all day, wondering what he's doing, hoping that im doing the right things, making him happy, hoping that i'll get some kind of sign of reassurance. i know he's there with me all the time but it gets hard to keep your faith strong. God planned out life like this so i can't complain... i just wonder why some people have different plans. one day with time i will understand what all this means for me. but back to something that makes me feel good... i definitely know that God places people in your life for one reason or another. it definitely helps to have a boyfriend there that shows you love, kindness and is open with his feelings all the time. sometimes just knowing that he's happy makes me happy. a relationship is like an investment. you gotta put a lot into it so that you can get a lot out of it over a period of time. right now i feel like i have a secure investment :-) its difficult to find someone who u connect and relate to. im blessed to have someone care so much about me and willing to do anything for me. ... a lot of times i think about how much my family has changed over this past year. i could have never imagined the changes that took place. man i lost my dad, about to have a nephew or two, found my long lost love and definitely about to tackle a semester of college all alone. but thats a whole different lj...something is gotta give for me pretty soon..... a person can only take so much. but i guess im just extraordinary or something like that hmmmmm...

just thinkin about everything we talked about today, and this stuck out the most. it makes me feel good to now that i still can make you nervous by doing something so simple as taking a shower... i love that you are in love with me and that you really appreciate me physically as well as intellectually. it makes me feel so complete and whole. something undescribable. its like i feel everything you're feeling. like i could tell that something was causing u 2 move a little slower...im glad that i still intrigue you. one thing that i think about a lot is whether or not our relationship will get old too quickly. not actually old, more like will we get too comfortable too quick. i still want to get excited when u come to see me or when u say u r going to call me. i still want to wait by the phone and smile when i see you sleeping. i love that u notice the little things about me, like when u told me about my eyes today...i really admire that you get completely into me. knowing everything that i like and don't like...every word im about to say before i say it and everything i think even though i dont tell u. its just weird how you know when something is wrong, when im having a bad day, when im thinking about something, just everything. i guess thats because we're meant to be or something like that lol. and something else that really stuck out in my mind today lets c...our painting project. lol thats what im going to call it. i just really appreciate the fact that we appreciate the same things. the arts are really important to me and im glad that u appreciate them too. but i really think i have a good idea for our project..something along the lines of layers of love, destiny or something like that. i gotta sketch some stuff out and see what direction i get bought into. i want this to be really really special, i already know its gonna have a lot of meaning so im not really worried about that. im excited about it! hmmm lets see so what else can i wrap about thats good.... considering i only have a month left here im really looking forward to spending a lot of time w/my babe... finding out more and more about him each day and revealing more about me too. i really want us to know every single thing about each other and really grow over this short time period. i can't wait to really get deep into our relationship, get some time under our belt, then i think i will be okay. its just that the distance scares me but i know if we keep our communication lines open and continue to find out more and more about each other each day then we will be beautiful. i love when u sing to me.....because your voice is remarkable! so its late as hell and i havent even heard ur voice all day, man i miss my babes. damn im so attracted to a man who works all day......sheesh but anyways.... i just got done reading this book called True Notebooks by Mark Salzman in TWO days. that joint was potent!!! man i hated that it was a true story because i really had my emotions entangled in every last page of that book. this book really touched me, i dont think i could ever forget it. i suggest that if you ever need a reason to love your freedom and your life...to read that book. it also made me really question the justice system and its injustice to human beings. even though convicts change lives for the worst they are humans too. im not trying to say that i dont agree that there should be some sort of punishment for offenders but there should also be the chance for change in a respectful, dignified manner. Anyways, another point in the book that i really really enjoyed was when the youth offenders discussed how they felt that it was wrong that men shouldn't cry. DAMN i loved that part! personally, i find nothing more sensitive, relatable, and normal than a PERSON male or female showing raw emotion. i think that a lot of times dudes get a bad wrap for showing their immediate emotion. my heart breaks when i see a male my age cry. just as if it were a female my age. then i started thinking that society makes males seem like they have to be untouchable. almost like they aren't real. life is real. tears are real. males are real. i know i cry at least once a week. sometimes i think about the good in my life and tears well up in my eyes. there's so much that i have to be thankful for. i just really love when a male feels comfortable enough to take off the mask that society places on him and show real emotion. im tryin to think about what song says "...you can still love your man and be manly dog..." i think that is so true. Love isn't sexist, racist, or anything like that. everyone who's anyone can fall in love with whatever they choose. because tomorrow is never promised.....cry......and tell the people that you love that you love them.

Hey everyone....sorry that it took this long to update, but i have a lot of stuff to write about... so here goes the first attempt to get everything down.

Aight, first of all i was really happy about coming back to atl. I missed everyone a lot that week and a half i was at home. It was really hard to leave my family too, we had went through a lot with each other and getting on the plane by myself just made me feel really alone. The A received me w/open arms, no questions asked. I also want to thank everyone who sent cards, called, prayed, or just stood by me in the passing of my dad. Its really hard to describe how it feels to lose a parent, the best word that I can think of is empty. Its like a void in my life. 

I also got a chance to visit my school... good ol' shs. No matter what anyone says about my "white" school, i love it. I missed everything about it too. For some reason I felt really old while i was there and really tall. lol. I had fun though... I miss having AP Psych with Kris and Ash!

All of my experiences back home were really difficult to get through b/c i remember times when my dad was there w/me. Like at my Grandma's house or even at my dad and stepmom's house. I would never wish this feeling on my worse enemy. One thing that I have learned from this experience is not to complain. Honestly, it could be worse and there are worse things to use complaints on. People go through many different things everyday and still bear a smile and continue to laugh. We are blessed to be able to breathe, eat, walk, just simple things that we take for granted everyday. Okay last but not least make sure you tell the people who mean something to you (anything to you) that you appreciate them/ love them. Say thank you. Its important to let them know how much you mean to them. Luckily, I had the chance to see my dad and to talk to him. 

Okay i'll finish the rest later...... thanks again everybody luv u guys a lot!

i am very sorry for not writing much lately... i just wanted everyone to know that I am doing okay and that the funeral is tomorrow.... please continue to pray for my family and myself. i hope to be back at cau by friday. thanks for all the phone calls and prayers!!! luv all of u guyz a lot!!! i miss my roomie whit!!!!

There's so much to write about right now....i don't know where to start. Well for one, my weekend at home was pretty cool. I was really happy to see my fam and everybody. It was cool. I got a chance to eat some real food! I went to Mchunu (dissapointment) they didn't have a good selection for females, but i still got some shirts. I really realized how much i am changing just by being around my family. I guess I can say im more independent now only b/c i do live on my own while here at cau. It was weird when my mom told me to be home at a decent hour and it was already 10:30. In all reality she just wants to feel like she still can tell me when to come home....its aight though.

Aight well the kevin situation is mediocre. Its mainly me and my thoughts... u know i think a lot. I just feel like we are at two different levels right now and instead of trying to figure things out....ending it would be easier. But then again ending it would hurt feelings. Its kind of like donell jones, where i wanna be. Actually it is like that song. I just need to figure out me for me. Needless to say I guess he had a good birthday. Thats the most expensive birthday gift ever...a round trip plane ticket. I do love him but i dont know if i need him right now. But hey everything happens for a reason. Another trip to new res...

The fam is doing good. Kristen and Ashley are getting old, but then I guess that means that I am too. My brother is the same, if anything funnier. Parents are good....my dad's holding on. Man, i don't think i ever shared this but my goal for myself is that my dad gets to see me graduate from college. i know that i shouldnt make that a goal considering i have no control over it, but it is. Its hard to face the reality of whats going on in your life. All of my parents mean the world to me and i dont know what i would do without any of them. Im a true "daddy's girl" and its hard for me to cope with certain things that are happening now. Like lately i've been thinking about getting married asap...so that i wouldn't have to face my biggest fear. It just consumes my mind everytime I think about it. Man i just have to keep my faith in God... he knows what I can bear.

Well school is school. What can I say? Ummmm my english paper is coated in red. Sooooo considering that I am an English major I took that as a stab to the heart. I just have to remember that its Mrs. Morgan and she only wants whats best for us. Its her job so I respect that but damn my paper is my heart. 

I guess you can say I am the one who tries to save the world at times. Sometimes I just want someone to save me. Some days I feel like telling the world what Im thinking and other times I just want to help. God made the world in 6 days and thats GOD...why do i feel like i need to save it in one day? 

Thats it for right now....God, please don't let my whole world crash down at once.

I guess today is the big day! Its funny because if this was about two weeks ago, I would be so excited to go home. I am going home for Kevin's b-day but he has been f'ing up lately so im really not pressed to see him. I also get my hair done on Saturday so i'm excited about that (u know how i am about the hair). I can honestly say that right now i really just want to go home to sleep and eat and see everybody. Kevin is on my bad list... but thats just because i let him get away w/too much. Aight I think thats about it...i can't wait to see Kristen and Ashley and my brothers and mommy and granny and daddy and my aunts and my cousins and everybody!!!!!!! See how i didn't put Kevin...he had me all pugnacious last night!  
Man, im also missing the dc metro club cookout at heritage...that really sucks too but its aight...i'll be back in 3 days! i hope everybody will miss me b/c i will miss everybody!

To my real roomie and my other real roomie....whit n ashlee...im going to miss you guys!!!!! have fun for me and ashlee dont sleep on my bed everyday! call me a lot and let me know what is going on. im glad we are roomies...4life!!! mi casa es su casa para vida!

Hey guyz....and whoever else wants to really know what goes on in my life, Whitney dragged me into this. WE, yes WE, can't even finish our journals for Ms. Morgan's class but yet she wants to start live journaling. I guess its worth a try. Whats the worst that can happen? I can just lose my scholarship and fail out of English and by the way I just happen to be an English major. 
So now I really like doing this journaling thing. Today's word of the day is unfathomable...yesterday it was lackadaisical. I'm trying to expand my vocabulary so its a cute way to do so. Now back to the whole Ms. Morgan thing, WE also can't even start our narratives that just happen to be due this week. Sometimes it seems like there just isn't enough time in the day to do what you really want to or need to do. 
College really tests your time management skills b/c clearly on Sunday my friends and I decided to wait 4 hours for carry out instead of doing 4 hours of homework. You live and you learn I guess. I really need to get with it though just to make sure I keep on top of things. 
UNFATHOMABLE: what I did yesterday.... and if you really know me then you know what I am referring to. Whitney said today that the internet is the vain of her existence, well college just might be mine. I know sooner than later some changes will/have to be made, personally, academically, all of the above. Well thats about it for right now.... don't miss me too much! I love Whitney.she's the best...yes everybody we did know each other before this!!!
